Nov. 11th
I am writing this on my knee in my cabin on the B&S steamer
Wuseh anchored off Nantung, on the North side of
the Yangtze, which
Max and I, lape to
river blockade and there we catch another steamer to Nenking. The

a struggle, although the police when they saw us cleared a lane for

been a Cossack. He had a
short rattan cane with a leather hand hold
which he wielded constantly over the heads, faces and shoulders of
the Chines e. Nantao had been bombed and shelled the day before,
